name: MagnuX
description:
Enjoy feeding sharks or you'll be their dinner.

If you reach the sea level, you'll be an easy prey and the game will be over.

Try to reach level 50 to get the 'MagnuX' award for your magnificent support to the sea creatures.

Every ten levels you will increase your fire speed.

Enjoy to play it PC, Android and iOS!

PC Controls:

  • Mouse for directions
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire
  • Ctrl - Fire
  • P - Pause the Game
  • Esc - Exit the Game

Hint: Hold Fire button to launch steaks continuously.

Food prefabs: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/6000

Shark: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/30428

Sky: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/3830
